Comentario: TERRIBLE ATTENTION. I had already bought here before, specific things that I asked for and paid for, but I went to ask about a diffuser for the hair dryer, to my surprise the girl answered that she had it for 60 thousand pesos and when I told her to show it to me it seemed like I asked him something impossible, he looked at me with a look of annoyance and looked for it almost obligatorily. I wonder: Do I have to buy a 60 thousand item without first seeing it or what is the point? I gave it to him, I thanked him and he didn't even respond. Bad education. Look for someone who is trained in customer service, I will never buy a nail file again here, there are plenty of stores like this without having to tolerate such bad energy.
